Thus, $\left(1+t x_{1}\right)\left(1+t x_{2}\right) \ldots\left(1+t x_{n}\right) \equiv 1+t$. Hence one of the numbers $x_{1}, \ldots, x_{n}$ equals 1 and the rest of them equal 0 .
